span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 囤货，藏货： a supply stored up and often hidden away
【例】 maintain a cache of food in case of emergencies 保存着食物的隐藏处以防万一
【近】 stash, stockpile, store, deposit, hoard, reserve

【考法 2】 v. 隐藏： to put into a hiding place
【例】 cached the fugitive slaves in their cellar until they could make their way to Canada 将奴隶们藏匿在房间的地下室直到他们能够顺利逃去加拿大
【近】 conceal, ensconce, secrete, squirrel away
【反】 display, exhibit 展示

【记】 秘密贮藏cash的地方
